summary: A series of official inmate count sheets and out-count forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 8-9, 2019. The documents record routine inmate population counts by housing unit and list specific inmates assigned to hospital or work details. These are administrative prison records from the time Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated there.

events.title: Evening Inmate Count at MCC
events.description: Routine official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, showing a total census of 759 inmates across various housing units.

events.title: Multiple Inmate Counts at MCC

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: These are administrative prison count sheets from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated August 8-9, 2019.
The documents show routine inmate population counts, with totals ranging from 755 to 760 inmates across various housing units (e.g., B-A, C-A, E-N, K-S).
Specific inmates are listed on hospital (HOSP) or work (TNWDVR) assignment rosters, including Gama-Pineda, Torres, Davila, Santana, Harrison, Mersey, Montas, Noboa, and Weber.

The forms include 'Official Out Count' sheets that must be submitted 45 minutes prior to a count, listing staff members preparing the count, though their names are not clearly legible in the provided text.
The dates of these records (August 8-9, 2019) coincide with the period Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated at the MCC prior to his death on August 10, 2019.
